GetNestedComponentsInChildren<T>(Transform, List<T>, Boolean, Type[])

Same as GetComponentsInChildren, but will not recurse into children with component of the DontRecurseOnT type. This allows nesting of PhotonViews/NetObjects to be respected.

Declaration
public static List<T> GetNestedComponentsInChildren<T>(this Transform t, List<T> list, bool includeInactive = true, params Type[] stopOn)

    where T : class
Parameters
Type Name Description
UnityEngine.Transform t
System.Collections.Generic.List<T> list

Pass null and a reused list will be used. Consume immediately.
System.Boolean includeInactive
System.Type[] stopOn

GetNestedComponentsInChildren<T, NestedT>(Transform, List<T>, Boolean)

Same as GetComponentsInChildren, but will not recurse into children with component of the DontRecurseOnT type. This allows nesting of PhotonViews/NetObjects to be respected.

GetNestedComponentsInChildren<T, SearchT, NestedT>(Transform, Boolean, List<T>)

Same as GetComponentsInChildren, but will not recurse into children with component of the NestedT type. This allows nesting of PhotonViews/NetObjects to be respected.

Declaration
public static void GetNestedComponentsInChildren<T, SearchT, NestedT>(this Transform t, bool includeInactive, List<T> list)

    where T : class where SearchT : class
Parameters
Type Name Description
UnityEngine.Transform t
System.Boolean includeInactive
System.Collections.Generic.List<T> list
Type Parameters
Name Description
T

Cast found components to this type. Typically Component, but any other class/interface will work as long as they are assignable from SearchT.
SearchT

Find components of this class or interface type.
NestedT

GetNestedComponentsInParents<T>(Transform, List<T>)

Returns all T found between the child transform and its root. Order in List from child to parent, with the root/parent most being last.

Declaration
public static void GetNestedComponentsInParents<T>(this Transform t, List<T> list)

    where T : Component

| Improve this Doc View Source

GetNestedComponentsInParents<T, NestedT>(Transform, List<T>)

Finds components of type T on supplied transform, and every parent above that node, inclusively stopping on node StopSearchOnT component.

GetParentComponent<T>(Transform)

Find T on supplied transform or any parent. Unlike GetComponentInParent, GameObjects do not need to be active to be found.
